results.title: Statin reverses smoke-induced pulmonary hypertension and prevents emphysema but not airway remodeling.
results.journal: Am J Respir Crit Care Med
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, as an intervention therapy, reverses the pulmonary vascular effects of cigarette smoke, including @DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertension@@@, and prevents smoke-induced @<m>DISEASE_Emphysema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004646 @@@emphysema@@@, but does not prevent small airway remodeling.

citations.NLM: Wright JL, Zhou S, Preobrazhenska O, Marshall C, Sin DD, Laher I, Golbidi S, Churg AM. Statin reverses smoke-induced pulmonary hypertension and prevents emphysema but not airway remodeling. Am J Respir Crit Care Med. 2011 Jan 1;183(1):50-8. PMID: 20709821
